mapper.insert: INSERT INTO holiday(holiday_date, employee_id, department_id,company_cd,work_code) SELECT TO_DATE(#{start_holiday},'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1 AS dates , '20120001','40','1000','HO101' FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE(#{end_holiday , jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(#{start_holiday, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD')+1)
